Imagery Description: (a) Young PanNon Sepcifiedsatyr, holding two reeds of a flute in his right hand, resting both hands on the lap of seated halfNon Sepcifieddraped Dionysos, who holds a phiale in his right hand and a thyrsus in his left, (b) seated halfNon Sepcifieddraped women to left, with 'skewer of fruit' and fillet in right hand, dish and fillet in left.
